events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorised under refund due to their request for money back.
Case assigned to agent Emma for handling the refund request related to incorrect order delivery.
Hello! I'm Emma from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received, so I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a clear photo of the incorrect item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order immediately and will also send you a prepaid return label.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt response! I appreciate your help with resolving this quickly.
We have processed your refund successfully and sent the return label to your email. Please return the incorrect item at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and that everything is resolved with your order.
Since the refund has been confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please let us know how we did with your refund request.
